content: a garter & eyelet cowl knit on the bias with an i-cord eyelet lace edge choose small or large enough to double up and work row a make the most of your colourful mini skeins row c ws k2 p1 dyo p2tog repeat to last 3 sts the cowl is worked flat and stitched into a circle once p1 sl2wyif desired length ** sizes small large 2 colour transition finished dimensions 10 wide x 26 52 around with colour 1 continuing from previous section work yarn koigu kpppm 100% merino wool 175yds per row a & b 50g 2 4 skeins in contrasting colours or zen yarn garden quartet 100% superwash merino join colour 2 work row a & b wool 800yds per 200g one set repeat these four row another 2 more times 3 stripes needles 3 75mm/us5 needles straight or long circular of each colour gauge 24 st = 4 /10cm in stockinette break colour 1 other tools darning needle crochet hook scrap yarn with colour 2 work there will be a total of 8 16 stripes in the finished - eyelet lace row a & c cowl beginning and ending with two partial stripes that - row a and row b a total of six times are grafted together - eyelet lace row a & c using crochet hook and scrap yarn provisionally cast on 80sts repeat from ** either transitioning back and forth using colour 1 between two colours or transitioning into new colours row a rs k2 ssk k to last 4 sts kf&b k1 sl2wyif another 6 14 more times row b ws k to last 2 sts sl2wyif repeat row a & b three more times © 2024 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca work 2 colour transition with the current colour and transitioning back into colour 1 to match the start abbreviations k knit with colour 1 work p purl kf&b knit front and back increase 1 sts - eyelet lace row a & c sl slip_stitch purlwise - row a row b and row a once more wyif with yarn in front dyo double yarn over wrap the working yarn over the right needle two times remove crochet chain for provisional cast on and put when you come back to this stitch on the newly-exposed live sts on a spare needle following row knit into it only one time holding right sides together graft together the two live this will create an extra-large eyelet edges rs/ws right side/wrong side ssk slip 2 sts knitwise move both to left needle and k 2 together through back of loop p2tog purl 2 together st s stitch es small and large shade cowls © 2024 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
